name: 1up Greenwood
description: Open daily 11:00am - Last call.  Most pinball games are $0.50 per play.  Newer ones are $1.00 per play.  Minors are allowed in with a parent 11am-3pm, Mon-Sat only.  Full food menu is available.

Horrible condition, has been for months.  At .75 a play, seems like a money grab.   Meg, Chris, and usually Lois do not register, even with a clean shot.  Switches gapped insanely, they “work”, but will never register.  Playfield has a solid black hue to it, it’s filthy.  Patrick doesn’t even register.  On top of that the right flipper is intermittent.  Bad shape, steer clear.   Head to the brewery 1 block away, their pins are great.

location_machine_xrefs.condition:
On September 13, 2018, this was in poor condition.  The upper flipper was unable to even come close in launching the ball up the Alpha ramp.  The left Battle Simulation cannon was also stuck in the "down" position and did not operate.  The wire cage from the shooter lane is loose and makes contact with the glass.

With the upper flipper useless, this machine is unplayable.

machine_conditions.comment:
On September 13, 2018, this was in poor condition.  The upper flipper was unable to even come close in launching the ball up the Alpha ramp.  The left Battle Simulation cannon was also stuck in the "down" position and did not operate.  The wire cage from the shooter lane is loose and makes contact with the glass.

With the upper flipper useless, this machine is unplayable.
